name: noticeably
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is easy to see or recognize: Ellen had become noticeably thinner. Her voice was shaking noticeably. See
noticeable
More examplesFewer examplesThis summer is noticeably warmer than previous ones.Our sales haven't noticeably suffered since the financial crisis.She was feeling noticeably better.
